EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering for the upcoming Boston Open House. See event details below.
Date: March 9, 2016 Time: 6-9 P.M. EST Location: 145 Broadway, 3rd Floor Cambridge, MA 02142
{{my.Save The Date:default=edit me}}
Questions? Please contact us via email <[[mailto:events@pivotal.io]]> or visit our website <[[http://pivotal.io/event/open-house/boston?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=boston-open-house]]>.
